channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-29067] insert-select-union-all query fails while publishing InsertEvent if source query does not return output
item.description:

item.summary: insert-select-union-all query fails while publishing InsertEvent if source query does not return output

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Merged to master.

Thanks for the fix nareshpr . Could you please cherry-pick this into branch-4.1

Thanks for the review and commit dkuzmenko 

I had raised PR#5948 for branch-4.1
